title: BOC sees match to Approved Intl Prospect player
custom_preconds: MLSB International Prospect Player has been approved in the system
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Create New widget and select International Amateur Player from dropdown
3. Fill in required fields with the info of an approved International Prospect Player
4. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed
2. Create New widget should be visible with International Fields
3. All fields should work appropriately
4. The system should display a match message indicating that a duplicate entry exists. The message will display the matching player's information with Register MLSB entered, Register, and Cancel button

title: Verify that user is returned to Create New Widget to enter a new player
custom_steps: 1. Click Cancel
custom_expected: 1. User should be returned to the Create New widget allowing the user to update the information and attempt to submit again.

title: View Profile
custom_steps: 1. Click the Player Profile link on the blocker window
custom_expected: 1. The system should display the selected Player Profile and cancels the player creation

title: Verify blank profile page is opened
custom_steps:
1. Click the radio button of the non-match profile 
2. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. Only the [Register] and [Cancel] buttons are active. [Register MLSB Entered] button is not active. 
2. The system proceeds with Profile creation. Player profile page should be loaded, and details entered in the create new widget should be populated.

title: Verify MLSB profile loaded and contact info is BLANK
custom_steps:
1. Click the radio button of the matched profile 
2. Click "Register MLSB Entered"
custom_expected:
1. Only [Register MLSB Entered] button and [Cancel] button is active. [Register] button is not active. 
2. The system should open the existing player's Profile in edit mode. The Contact Information section should be blank for the user to fill in.

title: Verify Match not found to player with Status of Submitted
custom_preconds: MLSB scout has submitted an International Prospect player to admin for approval.
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Create New widget
3. Select International Amateur Player from dropdown
4. Fill in required fields with the player details of a SUBMITTED (not yet approved) MLSB player
5. Click Register
6. Log in as Club 
7. Repeat steps 2-5
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed
2. Create New widget should be visible
3. Create New widget should update with the Amateur Player fields
4. All fields should work appropriately
5. The system should not display a match message and user is brought to profile page in edit mode
6. Dashboard displayed 
7. Same results as 2-5

title: Verify MLSB player does not match a Rejected Player
custom_preconds: International Prospect player has been rejected by admin and has a Status of Rejected.
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Create New widget
3. Select International Amateur Player from dropdown
4. Fill in required fields with the player details of a REJECTED MLSB player
5. Click Register
6. Log in as CLUB 
7. Repeat steps 2-5
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed
2. Create New widget should be visible
3. Create New widget should update with the Amateur Player fields
4. All fields should work appropriately
5. The system should not display a match message and user is brought to profile page in edit mode
6. Dashboard displayed 
7. Same results as 2-5

title: Create MLSB Group 1 or Group 2 Player
custom_steps:
1. Find an approved MLSB player and create a player report for the player using the create new widget (Select International Player Report)
2. Fill in required fields for report, Make the player have an OFP higher than 50
3. Submit Report
4. Login as MLSB admin and find submitted report and open it
5. Approve report
6. Open Player's profile and verify Group 1 or Group 2 checkbox is checked
custom_expected:
1. Player should be approved, new report is opened.
2. Fields work accordingly.
3. Report shows status of submitted.
4. Dashboard displayed and player report is opened. 
5. Report shows status of Approved.
6. Checkbox for Group 1 or 2 should be checked.

title: Register Player that is a match to MLSB Group 1 or Group 2 Player
custom_steps:
1. Login as BOC
2. Create a player with the same info as a MLSB created player that has an OFP 50 or higher
3. Match message displayed, Click Register, DO NOT CLICK REGISTER MLSB ENTERED 
4. Fill in required fields and click register
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard displayed
2. Player is created
3. Remaining fields are displayed appropriately 
4. Player is registered

title: Verify profile merged correctly
custom_preconds: MLSB player is marked as a match to a registered player in the reg admin widget
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate player on reg admin widget that has MLSB match 
3. Expand the MLSB match 
4. Click the tick box next to their names
5. Click Merge
6. MLSB Scout cannot be selected as Master for BIO or Birth certificate or consent forms. Only Contact info
7. Click Merge
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. List of player should be visible. Find two or more profiles to merge, one being a profile submitted by MLSB
4. The tick boxes should be populated
5. Merge prompt should be displayed
6. Master sections have been selected
7. Profiles should be merged

title: Verify that merge profile is visible to all
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC/MLSB/CLUB
2. Search for merged player profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. BOC, CLUB and MLSB should all see the profile regardless of which profile is designated as the Master Copy because player is Group 1 or 2

title: Check that Scouting Subsection is displayed
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC/MLSB
2. Search for merged player profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. BOC and MLSB should all see the Scouting Info Subsection

title: Check that Scouting Subsection is displayed for Club
custom_steps:
1. Log in as CLUB
2. Search for merged player profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. CLUB should see the Scouting Info Subsection

title: Check all Scouting reports attached to MLSB player that have been merged and attached
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC/MLSB
2. Verify Scouting reports have been merged and tied to merged profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Any scouting reports linked to either of the profiles selected for merge will be tied to the resulting merged profile.

title: Ensure the match appears in the Reg Admin widget
custom_preconds: Login as MLSB Admin, MLSB Scout, Club, BOC
custom_steps:
1) Log in as MLSB Scout
2) Create a new player profile.
3) Log in as MLSB Admin
4) Create a new player profile.
5) Approve the player created in Step 2 and Step 4.
6) Log in as Club
7) Create a new player profile that is a match of the profile created in Step 2. (You should be given a match warning but have the ability to create the profile anyway.)
8) Create a new player profile that is a match of the profile created in Step 4. (You should be given a match warning but have the ability to create the profile anyway.)
9) Log in as BOC
10) Find the player created in Step 7 in the Reg Admin widget. Check the MLSB matches column.
11) Click the + to expand the MLSB match column.
12) Find the player created in Step 8 in the Reg Admin widget. Check the MLSB matches column.
13) Click the + to expand the MLSB match column.
custom_expected:
10) The MLSB match column should show 1 to indicate that a match exists for the player. 
11) The row expansion should open and the player created in Step 2 should appear as a match for the player created in Step 7. The expansion should include the option to Ignore the match. 
12) The MLSB match column should show 1 to indicate that a match exists for the player. 
13) The row expansion should open and the player created in Step 4 player created in Step 8 should appear as a match for the player created in Step 4. The expansion should include the option to Ignore the match.

title: Keep both player profiles.
custom_steps:
1) Log in as BOC.
2) Find a player with a "1" or higher in the MLSB Match column.
3) Open the row expansion containing the match. Click Ignore on the proposed match.
4) Click Cancel on the confirmation prompt.
5) Click Ignore on the proposed match.
6) Click OK on the confirmation prompt.
custom_expected:
3) A confirmation prompt appears.
4) The confirmation prompt disappears. The profiles are not merged, and the matched profile remains visible.
5) A confirmation prompt appears.
6) The confirmation prompt disappears. The profiles are not merged. The matched profile is no longer shown and the MLSB match column now reads 1 less than it did before (most likely will be 0 now).

title: Merge Matching Profiles
custom_steps:
1) Log in as BOC
2) Find a player with "1" or higher in the MLSB match column. 
3) Click + in the MLSB Match column.
4) Click the checkbox  next to the original player and the match's names.
5) Click Merge
6) Click Cancel on the confirmation prompt.
7) Click Merge.
8) Click Merge on the confirmation prompt.
custom_expected:
3) The field is expanded and the match is shown
5) A confirmation prompt is shown.
6) The confirmation prompt disappears. The profiles are not merged. The matched profile remains visible in the widget.
7) A confirmation prompt is shown with the ability to select which profile to set as the 'Master'. The Bio, The Consent Form and Birth Certificate radio buttons for the MLSB created profile should be disabled. 
8) The confirmation prompt disappears. The profiles are merged. The MLSB match colun now reads 1 less than it did before."

title: Verify a trainer/agent can be merged
custom_preconds: Log in as BOC and Locate Trainer/Agent widget
custom_steps:
1. Check the checkboxes of the two Trainer/Agent profiles that you wish to merge 
2. Select which profile to keep
3. Click merge 
4. Open merged Trainer/Agent profiel profile
custom_expected:
1. Boxes become checked
2. System displays a confirmation message prompting user to select the profile to keep and confirm the merge. 
3. System merges the two trainer/agent profiles and "Trainer/Agents merged successfully" blue notification displays. Trainer/Agent widget refreshes to display the merge
4.  The resulting trainer/agent profile contains all of the information from the profile selected to keep. The information from the other profile is discarded.

title: Verify that MLSB users can see all contact info attached to player profiles, regardless of who submitted them
custom_steps:
1. Observe contact information in a REGISTERED player profile that they have permission to view.
2. Attempt to view documents attached to profile.
3. Click Edit, attempt to attach new documents to the profile.
custom_expected:
1. Contact information should all be visible to MLSB user.
2. Attached files should NOT be visible.
3. MLSB user should NOT be able to attach new files.

title: Verify that players designated to have participated in MLB Showcase are visible to all users
custom_steps:
1. Log in as CLUB
2. Create player who is subject to registration.
3. Log in as BOC.
4. Designate player created in Step 2 to have participated in MLB Showcase by checking MLB Showcase box in profile.
5. Log in as a different CLUB than the one used in Step 1.
6. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
7. Create a player profile that is a 100% match to player created in Step 2.
8. Log in as MLSB user
9. Search for player that has participated in MLB Showcase
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Profile is created successfully.
3. Dashboard should be displayed.
4. Player is designated as MLB Showcase participant.
5. Dashboard should be displayed.
6. Player profile should be visible.
7. Profile created in Step 2 should appear as duplicate entry.
8. Dashboard is displayed
9. Player profile is visible to user.

title: Verify that players entered by MLSB appear as duplicates when another user enters a matching player
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB user
2. Create a player who is subject to registration and is not a Group 1 or Group 2 player, and is not Suspect. 
3. Log in as MLSB Admin and approve the player the MLSB user created
4. Log in as CLUB
5. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
6. Create a player who is a 100% match to the player created in Step 2.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player should be created successfully.
3. Player has status of approved.
4. Dashboard should be displayed.
5. Player should NOT appear in search results.
6. Player SHOULD appear as a duplicate.

title: Convert the player to a Preliminary Prospect player
custom_steps:
1. Log in as SCOUT
2. Create a new player profile. Save, but do not Submit the player.
3. Review the player profile just created

*'The player created in Step 2 is referred to as 'the player' in future steps.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Player should be created successfully.
3. Player's status should be Preliminary, and appears on the scout clipboard

title: Verify that only the creating Scout can see the player
custom_steps:
1. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
2. Log in as a different MLSB SCOUT user than was used to create the player
3. Use Quicksearch to search for the player
4. Log in as MLSB Admin
5. Use Advanced Search to search for the player
6. Log in as BOC
7. Use Advanced Search to search for the player
custom_expected:
1. Player should appear in Quicksearch results
2. Dashboard should be displayed
3. Player should NOT appear in Quicksearch results
4. Dashboard should be displayed
5. Player should appear in search results.
6. Dashboard should be displayed
7. Player should appear in search results.

title: Verify that it is only visible to BOC users via Advanced Search, and to MLSB users via Quicksearch
custom_steps:
1. Log in as SCOUT used to create the player
2. Submit the player.
3. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
4. Log in as BOC
5. Use Quicksearch to search for the player and Advance Search for player.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player status should be changed to Submitted.
3. Player should appear in Quicksearch results.
4. Dashboard should be displayed.
5. Player should NOT appear in Quicksearch results but should appear in Advance Search.

title: Verify that is only appears as a match for MLSB users
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Attempt to create player that is 100% match of player
3. Log in as MLSB Admin
4. Attempt to create player that is 100% match of player
5. Log in as SCOUT that created the player.
6. Attempt to create player that is 100% match of player
7. Log in as SCOUT that did not create the player.
8. Attempt to create player that is 100% match of player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player should NOT appear as a match.
3. Dashboard should be displayed.
4. Player should appear as a match.
5. Dashboard should be displayed.
6. Player should appear as a match.
7. Dashboard should be displayed.
8. Player should appear as a match.

title: Verify that it is only visible to the submitting scout, BOC, and MLSB users
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Admin
2. Change status of player to Rejected
3. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
4. Use Advanced Search to search for the player.
5. Log in as BOC
6. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
7. Use Advanced Search to search for the player.
8. Log in as SCOUT that created the player
9. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
10. Use Advanced Search to search for the player.
11. Log in as SCOUT that did not create the player
12. Use Quicksearch to search for the player.
13. Use Advanced Search to search for the player.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player's status is updated successfully.
3. Player should NOT appear in quicksearch results.
4. Player should appear in Advanced Search results.
5. Dashboard should be displayed.
6. Player should NOT appear in quicksearch results.
7. Player should appear in Advanced Search results.
8. Dashboard should be displayed.
9. Player should appear in quicksearch results.
10. Player should appear in Advanced Search results
11. Dashboard should be displayed.
12. Player should NOT appear in Quicksearch results.
13. Player should NOT appear in advanced search results.

title: Verify MLSB users can view a Submitted Grandfathered player
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Scout 1
2. Create a Grandfathered player and submit it for approval (Birthdate must be before 09/01/1995)
3. Log in as MLSB Scout 2 (Scout that did not create player)
4. Advance Search and Quicksearch for created, submitted player.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard displayed.
2. Grandfathered player is created and submitted. Not yet approved.
3. Scout 2 dashboard displayed.
4. Player is visible in advanced search. (If player is 23 or older the player will NOT appear in Quicksearch)

title: Verify MLSB user can view an Approved Grandfathered player
custom_preconds:
[C59687]
Grandfathered player must be submitted for approval
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Admin
2. Locate created player and approve him
3. Log in as Scout 2 (Scout that did NOT create player)
4. Advance search and Quicksearch for created, approved player
custom_expected:
1. Admin dashboard displayed.
2. Grandfathered player is approved.
3. Scout 2's dashboard displayed.
4. Approved Player is visible to non-creating scout through advanced search. (If player is 23 years or older they will not appear in Quicksearch)

title: Verify a player created by BOC or CLUB can be viewed by MLSB Scout
custom_steps:
1. Login as BOC or CLUB
2. Create a Grandfathered player (Birthdate should be before 09/01/1995)
3. Login as MLSB Scout
4. Advance search and Quicksearch for created player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard displayed.
2. Grandfathered Player is created. Note: Only 'Save' and 'Cancel' are the only button present.
3. Dashboard displayed.
4. Player is visible to Scout through advance search. (If player is 23 years or older they will not appear in Quicksearch)

title: Verify that BOC users can see all newly registered players
custom_steps:
1. Log in as CLUB
2. Create a player who is subject to registration. Click Register 
3. Log in as BOC.
4. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Player should be created successfully
3. Dashboard should be displayed
4. Player should be visible in search results.

title: Verify that all users are able to see Level 2-selected player profiles.
custom_steps:
1. Log in as a different CLUB than was used to create the profile
2. Search for L2 player that has not been added to the club reg list
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Profile should be fully visible

title: Verify that Group 1 / 2 player profile is visible to all users, and appears as duplicate entry when other users attempt to create a new profile.
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Create a Group 1 or Group 2 player who is subject to registration and is not Suspect.
3. Log in as CLUB
4. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2. (Quicksearch and Advance Search)
5. Create a player profile that is a 100% match to player created in Step 2.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Profile is created successfully.
3. Dashboard should be displayed.
4. Player profile should be visible.
5. Profile created in Step 2 should appear as duplicate entry.

title: Verify that only BOC user can see players registered by BOC
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Create player who is subject to registration, who has not been selected for Level 2 Registration and who is not tagged as having participated in an MLB Showcase.
3. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
4. Log in as CLUB
5. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
6. Log in as MLSB Scout
7. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player should be created successfully.
3. Player should appear in search results.
4. Dashboard should be displayed.
5. Player should NOT appear in search results.
6. Dashboard should be displayed.
7. Player should NOT appear in search results.

title: Verify that clubs cannot see unverified players that they did not enter.
custom_steps:
1. Log in as CLUB
2. Create player who is subject to registration.
3. Log in as a different CLUB than the one used in Step 1
4. Select 'International Amateur' in the Search dropdown, search for the player created in Step 2.
5. Create a player who is a 100% match to the player created in Step 2.
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed.
2. Player should be created successfully.
3. Dashboard should be displayed.
4. Player should NOT appear in search results.
5. Player should NOT display as a duplicate.

title: Verify that newly created Suspect profiles can be Saved
custom_steps:
1. Login as MLSB scout
2. Fill out required fields on create new
3. Click Next
4. Locate scouting status dropdown
5. Change scouting status to International Suspect and fill in all required fields
6. Click save
7. Quicksearch Player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed.
2. Fields work as expected
3. User is brought to profile in edit mode
4. Scouting status dropdown located in the profile header. Scouting status should be defaulted to Prospect.
5. Dropdown list should be displayed. After suspect has been selected profile should be update. There should be no "Submit" button present. Only "Save" and "Cancel" should be displayed.
6. Profile is saved and page reloads in view mode.
7. Suspect Player appears in Red

title: Verify that Suspect profiles are shown as a match when a duplicate player is created
custom_steps:
1. Login as a different MLSB Scout
2. Enter info into create new widget of a previously entered suspect player
3. Click next
custom_expected:
1. Scout dashboard displays.
2. Fields should work appropriately. 
3. Match message displays for suspect player. Note: Override and Back are the only buttons present.

title: Convert the player to a  Submitted Intl Prospect player
custom_preconds: Login as MLSB player who created a Suspect player
custom_steps:
1. Open Suspect players profile
2. Click edit
3. Change the 'Scouting Status' to International Prospect
4. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. Profile opens in view mode.
2. Profile reloads in edit mode.
3. Profile is converted into an International Prospect player. Note: 'Submit' and 'Cancel' are the only two buttons present.  
4. Player profile is submitted for approval.

title: Verify that these changes require no approval
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Open the player created in previous step
3. Click register MLSB entered, change at least one field in bio information, 
click Register
4. Log in as MLSB Admin
5. Open the player created in previous step
6. Click Edit, change at least one field
7. Attempt to edit Bio Information
8. Click Save
9. Verify that changes from Step 3 and Step 6 are saved to the profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Profile should be displayed
3. Changes should be submitted successfully
4. Dashboard should be displayed
5. Profile should be displayed
6. Field should be updated
7. User should NOT be able to edit Bio Information
8. Changes should be submitted successfully
9. All changes should be reflected on the profile.

title: Verify that both users can make updates to profiles not subject to registration
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Create a player who is not subject to registration, submit it
3. Log in as BOC
4. Open the profile created in Step 2
5. Click Edit, change at least one field, click Save
6. Log in as CLUB
7. Open the profile created in Step 2
8. Click Edit, change at least one field, click Save
9. Review the changes made in Step 5 and 8
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Player should be submitted successfully
3. Dashboard should be displayed
4. Profile should be displayed
5. Changes should be saved successfully
6. Dashboard should be displayed
7. Profile should be displayed
8. Changes should be saved successfully
9. Both sets of edits should be reflected on the profile without needing approval

title: Verify that both users can make updates to Approved, Prospect profiles subject to registration
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Create a Intl Prospect Player is subject to registration
3. Log in as BOC
4. Open the profile created in Step 2.
5. Click Register MLSB entered, complete the profile, click Submit
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Player should be submitted successfully
3. Dashboard should be displayed
4. Profile should be displayed
5. Changes should be saved successfully

title: Verify that player is added successfully to scouting list when user clicks cancel
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Enter in the information of a REGISTERED player (registered by BOC or club) click next
3. Click Add to scouting list
4. Click Cancel
5. Quicksearch for Player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. Match message displays with matching profile option and three buttons, Add to scouting list, Add player report, Back
3. User is brought to players profile in edit mode. User is NOT able to edit bio information. Submit, save and cancel buttons are displayed at bottom of the page.
4. Player is added to the scouting list and user is brought to dashboard.
5. User is able to search for player and open profile.

title: Verify that player is added successfully to scouting list and that user can update profile- Save
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Enter in the information of a REGISTERED player (registered by BOC or club) click next
3. Click Add to scouting list 
4. Enter scouting information and click save 
5. Return to dashboard and view scout clipboard 
6. Quicksearch for Player and open profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed 
2. Match message displays with matching profile option and three buttons, Add to scouting list, Override, Back
3. User is brought to players profile in edit mode. User is NOT able to edit bio information. Submit, save and cancel buttons are displayed at bottom of the page.
4. Player can edit scouting information and contact information, fields work appropriately. 
5. Dashboard is displayed, International Player Updated with a status of Preliminary is on clipabord
6. User can search for the profile because the player has been sucessfully added to the scouting list and will see update

title: Verify that player is added successfully to scouting list and that user can update profile- Submit
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Enter in the information of a REGISTERED player (registered by BOC or club) click next
3. Click Add to scouting list 
4. Enter scouting information and contact information and click submit
5. Return to dashboard and view scout clipboard 
6. Quicksearch for Player and open profile
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed 
2. Match message displays with matching profile option and three buttons, Add to scouting list, Add player report, Back
3. User is brought to players profile in edit mode. User is NOT able to edit bio information. Submit, save and cancel buttons are displayed at bottom of the page.
4. Player can edit scouting information and contact information, fields work appropriately. 
5. Dashboard is displayed, International Player Updated with a status of Submit is on clipabord
6. User can search for the profile because the player has been sucessfully added to the scouting list and will see the update

title: Verify that user can approve update and that update becomes the approved version for all users
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Admin
2. Search for submitted player from previous step on scouting admin clipboard
3. Open profile 
4. Click Approve
5. Log in as MLSB 
6. Quicksearch for player 
7. Log in as BOC
8. Quicksearch for player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. International Player Update should be on scouting admin clipboard with a status of submitted
3. Updated version of the profile updates, updated fields are in red 
4. User is able to approve the profile 
5. Dashboard is displayed 
6. User is able to search for player, and see the last approved version of the profile, with their updates 
7. Dashboard should be displayed 
8. User is able to search for player and see the last approved version of the profile, with the mlsb updates.

title: Verify that user can reject update and that update does not become the approved version for all users
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Admin
2. Search for submitted player previous on scouting admin clipboard
3. Open profile 
4. Click Reject
5. Log in as MLSB 
6. Quicksearch for player 
7. Log in as BOC
8. Quicksearch for player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard should be displayed
2. International Player Update should be on scouting admin clipboard with a status of submitted
3. Updated version of the profile updates, updated fields are in red 
4. User is able to reject the profile 
5. Dashboard is displayed 
6. User is able to search for player because player is still on the scouting list, and sees the last approved version of the profile,not the profile with updates 
7. Dashboard should be displayed 
8. User is able to search for player and see the last approved version of the profile, no mlsb updates

title: Verify that user can add the player to the scouting list
custom_preconds: Log in as BOC and view L2 Registered widget to find a player
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Scout 1
2. Quicksearch for a L2 Registered player 
3. Click Add to scouting list button and edit fields
4. Click Submit
5. Log in as MLSB Scout 2
6. Search for same L2 Registered Player
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed
2. User is able to view profile, Add to scouting list button and Close button 
3. Profile reloads in edit mode, user can add scouting information and contact information. Cannot edit bio information 
4. Profile is submitted to admin for approval. It is treated as an intl player update 
5. Dashboard is displayed 
6. User is able to search for player, there is no add to scouting list button on the profile.

B. Create new player and click register

6. Search for same player that participated in MLB showcase

3. Profile reloads in edit mode, user can add scouting information and contact information. Cannot edit bio information 
4. Profile is submitted to admin for approval. It is treated as an intl player update

title: Verify that user can add the player to the scouting list
custom_steps:
A. Log in as BOC
B. Create new player and click register 
C. Fill out required fields and click register
D. Click Make Public button
1. Log in as MLSB
2. Quicksearch for a player that was made public
3. Click add to scouting list button and edit fields
4.Click Submit
5. Log in as MLSB field scout 2
6. Search for same player that was made public
custom_expected:
A. Dashboard should be displayed 
B. Profile loads in edit mode 
C. Fields work as expected and player is successfully registered. 
D. Player is made public to all users 
1. Dashboard is displayed
2. User is able to view profile, Add to scouting list button and Close button 
3. Profile reloads in edit mode, user can add scouting information and contact information. Cannot edit bio information 
4. Profile is submitted to admin for approval. It is treated as an intl player update 
5. Dashboard is displayed 
6. User is able to search for player, there is no add to scouting list button on the profile.

title: Verify BOC can edit Scouting info
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Open reg profile that has scouting info section 
3. Click edit 
4. Make some changes to section 
5. Click save
custom_expected: Changes should stick.

title: Verify that Scouts cannot edit Bio Section of an approved player
custom_preconds:
Login as MLSB Scout
Player must be REGISTERED
custom_steps:
1. Quicksearch and open player
2. Click edit
3. Try and change something the the players BIO Section
custom_expected:
1. Players profile opens in view mode
2. Players profile opens in edit mode
3. Bio section is frozen

title: Override a Matched Registered Player
custom_steps:
1. Login as MLSB
2. Create a player who already has a registered player profile
3. Click Override to match message shown
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard displayed.
2. Fill in fields appropriately.
3. Profile creation process continues.

title: Verify that a registered player is automatically added to the Possible L2 list
custom_steps:
1. Log in as MLSB Scout
2. Add a registered player to the scouting list 
3. Create a report for the player that has an OFP of 50 or higher and submit it 
4. Log in as MLSB Admin 
5. Approve the report for the registered player
6. Log in as BOC 
7. Locate player on L2 Possibility list
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard displayed.
2. Player is added to Scouting list clipboard.
3. Blank report opens, fields are filled in appropriately.
4. Dashboard displayed for admin.
5. Report is approved. 
6. Dashboard is displayed 
7. Player can now be found on the L2 Possibility List clipboard.

title: Verify that an entered player is automatically added to the Possible L2 list
custom_steps:
1. Login as MLSB Scout
2. Create a new player and submit him
3. Create a report for new player with an OFP of 50 or higher and submit for approval
4. Log in as MLSB Admin 
5. Approve the submitted player and submitted report
6. Login as BOC
7. Search for MLSB player and open profile 
8. Click register MLSB Entered 
9. Locate L2 Possibility Check box 
10. Continue to register the player and click register
11. Locate the player on L2 Possibility Widget
custom_expected:
1. Scout's dashboard displayed.
2. Player is created and submitted.
3. Report is created and submitted. 
4. Dashboard displayed.
5. Both items are successfully approved 
6. Dashboard is displayed 
7. Player appears in search and profile loads in view mode
8. Profile reloads to edit mode 
9. L2 possibility checkbox in header is already checked 
10. Player is successfully registered 
11. Player is located on the L2 Possibility Widget

title: BOC takes off L2 possibility, MLSB will not be automatically added again
custom_steps:
1. Locate player from test case [C59627] on L2 Possibility widget 
2. Click the trash can next to the widget and click yes 
3. Log in as MLSB admin 
4. Create an International Player report with OFP 50 or higher
5. Approve the report 
6. Log in as BOC 
7. Search and open player profile 
8. Locate L2 Possibility Checkbox
custom_expected:
1. Player appears on widget
2. Player is removed from L2 Possibility widget and is no longer marked as an L2 possibility 
3. Dashboard displays 
4. Report is successfully created 
5. Report is successfully approved 
6. Dashboard displays 
7. Profile opens in view mode 
8. L2 possibility box is not checked.

title: Register a player
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC 
2. Register an L1 Player (Birthday 9/1/1995 or after)
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard is displayed 
2. Player is successfully registered.

title: Set first review of player
custom_steps:
1. Search and open player profile from [C61216]
2. Click edit 
3. Set First review to Pre-Verified 
4. Click save
custom_expected:
1. Profile opens in View mode 
2. Profile reloads to edit mode. Registration Review section is now available 
3. User able to select Pre-Verified 
4. Profile is saved

title: Receive match to player
custom_preconds:
[C61217]
Take note of First Name, Last Name, Birthdate, and Player ID of player created in [C61217]

Log in as club
custom_steps:
1. Enter info listed in pre-condition of player from [C61217] in create new. Have all other fields be different
2. Click Next
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected 
2. User received match message to player since 4 of the 7 fields are the same

title: Register player without using matched profile
custom_steps:
1. Click register on match message, do not click Add to Club reg list 
2. Fill out all required fields 
3. Click register 
4. Click register on match message
custom_expected:
1. International profile loads in edit mode 
2. Fields work as expected 
3. Match message appears 
4. Profile successfully registers.

title: Merge Two profiles
custom_preconds:
[C61219]
Two profiles were created in [C61219] and [C61216] 

Log in as BOC
custom_steps:
1. Locate reg admin widget 
2. Filter for players created in [C61219] and [C61216] 
3. Check the checkbox next to their names 
4. Click Merge
5. Select either as master and Click merge
6. Open profile and view player ID and Previous ID
custom_expected:
1. Reg admin widget displayed
2. Players appear in widget
3. Checkbox able to be checked 
4. Message appears for user to select master 
5. Profile is successfully merged 
6. Earliest Player id, regardless of who was selected as master, remains the Player id, and previous ID contains both IDs the profile had

title: Search for player using both Player IDs
custom_steps:
1. Click search on left nav 
2. Set Search for International Amateur Player 
3. Filter for both IDs that are listed in Previous IDs for player merged in [C61220]
4. Log in as club 
5. Repeat steps 1-3
custom_expected:
1. Advance Search appears 
2. International Amateur Player selected 
3. Using both IDs to search will produce the same profile 
4. Dashbord displays 
5. Same results as 1-3
